mapper.insert: insert into reply(seqs, id, password, contents, seq) values((select nvl(max(seqs), 0)+1 from reply),#{id},#{password},#{contents},#{seq})
mapper.select: SELECT seqs, id, password, contents, REGDATE, cnt, seq FROM ( SELECT seqs, id, password, contents, REGDATE, cnt, seq, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY seqs DESC) AS RNUM FROM reply ) MP WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{rowStart} AND #{rowEnd} ORDER BY seqs DESC
SELECT COUNT(seqs) FROM reply WHERE seqs > 0
update reply set cnt = cnt + 1 where seqs = #{seqs}
mapper.update: update reply set contents=#{contents}, id=#{id} where seqs=#{seqs}
